name: Sickening Critical

sections.text: Whenever you score a critical hit, your opponent becomes sickened for 1 minute. The effects of this feat do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the effect's duration.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
sections.name: Special

description: Your critical hits cause opponents to become sickened.
